summary: This document is an AT&T wireless billing statement for Jeffrey E. Epstein covering the period July 13, 2003, to August 12, 2003. It details multiple phone lines/accounts under his name, showing extensive call logs, roaming charges from domestic and international locations, and significant messaging activity. The bill reveals a pattern of frequent communication with locations in New York, Florida, the U.S. Virgin Islands, and international calls to Europe.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder for multiple AT&T wireless lines, with billing details showing extensive domestic and international call activity.

events.title: Wireless Billing Period
events.description: The billing cycle for Jeffrey Epstein's AT&T wireless accounts, showing detailed call logs, roaming, and messaging activity.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein held multiple AT&T wireless lines with high monthly charges totaling over $2,451.88 for the period.
Call logs show a high volume of calls to and from locations in New York, Florida, Maryland, Virginia, and international destinations.
Significant roaming activity is documented, including calls from the U.S. Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Italy, France, Great Britain, and Spain.
The bill indicates frequent communication with area codes associated with Palm Beach, Florida (561), and Greensboro, North Carolina (336).
Messaging (SMS) activity is recorded, though the content and recipients are not detailed in the billing summary.
